use.flag: Enable 7z binary with all codecs compiled as shared library and with support for external codecs
Enable 7za standalone binary which supports only 7z, xz, cab, zip, gzip, bzip2, and tar formats
Enable 7zdec, a tiny standalone binary which supports only 7z decompression. Use lto to produce even smaller binary.
Enable 7za standalone binary which supports 7z format only
Enable 7zz stanadlone binary with support for all codecs. If 7z binary is not enabled, 7z symlink is installed automatically
Enable assembler code on x86 and amd64, build with dev-lang/jwasm
Enable support of rar archive decoding with unRAR-licensed rar decoder
